'''Strange Mark''' is a [[Random Event]] that can occur while exploring the world.

==Steps==
# Blow away the strange mark with Anemo
#* Dissipating the dust will cause enemies to spawn.
#* Enemies must be defeated to complete this Random Event.

==Dialogue==
{{Dialogue start}}
;(When triggering the quest)
:'''Paimon''': Eh? What's this? ...It looks like dust, but with elemental marks on.
:'''Paimon''': Paimon wonders if you can use the wind to get rid of it...
{{Dialogue end}}
